fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We said that fines issued against firms “by employment tribunals are discounted for early repayment” (Revenue teams catch only one in eight firms paying illegally low wages, 8 January, page 7). HM Revenue and Customs advises that it (HMRC) issues such fines, and that discounting does not always apply. • Other recently corrected articles include: Dominic Raab warns Iran of ‘pariah’ status after ambassador arrest Impeachment: Trump fumes as Pelosi prepares to send articles to the Senate
